mapper.select: select SYS_USER.*,SYS_ORGAN.ORGAN_CODE from SYS_USER INNER JOIN SYS_ORGAN ON SYS_ORGAN.ID=SYS_USER.ORGAN_ID where SYS_USER.DELETED = '0' AND SYS_USER.LOGIN_NAME = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update SYS_USER
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULLNAME = #{fullname,jdbcType=OTHER},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGAN_ID = #{organId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=OTHER},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLE = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ENABLED_DATETIME = #{enabledDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISABLE_DATE_TIME = #{disableDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISLEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRATION_DATE = #{expirationDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSECRET = #{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOME_MODULE = #{homeModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

POST,

USER_ID,

ROLE_ID,

#{organId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select ROLE_ID from SYS_USER_ROLE where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select USER_ID as id from SYS_USER_ROLE where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ROLE_ID as userId from sys_user_role_part_time where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
